item.label: List 50 States-Full Name

item.label: Currency Dropdown
item.description: Displays a drop down form element with 164 Countries, the value of each element being the Currency abbreviation for that Country.
item.content:
<select name="currency">
<option value="USD" SELECTED>US Dollar (USD)</option>
<option value="AFA">Afghanistan Afghani (AFA)</option>
